label: Generation Service â€” TTF / tokens / errors (Studio)
description: Dashboard Studio JSON for Generation service metrics (TTF, tokens/sec, tokens_total, errors)

panels.title: TTF (ms) by provider
panels.query: | mstats avg(_value) WHERE metric_name="generation.ttf" earliest=-30m@h by provider span=1m | timechart avg(_value) as "TTF (ms)" by provider

panels.title: Tokens / sec (throughput)
panels.query: | mstats avg(_value) WHERE metric_name="generation.tokens_per_second" earliest=-30m@h by provider span=1m | timechart avg(_value) as "tokens/s" by provider

panels.title: Total tokens (counter)
panels.query: | mstats sum(_value) WHERE metric_name="generation.tokens" earliest=-24h by provider | timechart sum(_value) as "tokens_total" by provider

panels.title: Error rate by type
panels.query: | mstats sum(_value) WHERE metric_name="generation.errors" earliest=-6h by error_type,provider | chart sum(_value) as errors by error_type, provider

panels.title: Recent error events
panels.query: index=main OR index=errors "provider failed" OR "provider_error" | table _time, host, source, sourcetype, _raw
